About me

Hi, I'm Luke Grippa! I have a Bachelors in Computer Engineering with minors in Computer Science and Cybersecurity. I love to travel, play guitar, and snowboard.

On this website you can find a list of the projects I have completed as well as a link to my cybersecurity blog. Thanks for checking it out, feel free to reach out to me with any questions or concerns!
